description: Are you looking for a refreshing&nbsp;summer cocktail you want to enjoy without feeling lethargic the next day? Try the Raspberry White Claw!This light and delicious cocktail is easy to make. Best of all, it’s an ideal summer refreshment that you can drink all day since it’s not too boozy. Cheers!
name: Raspberry White Claw
recipeIngredient: 12 oz. White Claw Raspberry hard seltzer

recipeInstructions.name: In a drinking glass with ice, pour ½ of the white claw hard seltzer can, 3¾ ounce of lemon-lime soda, 1 teaspoon of grenadine, and ½ teaspoon of lime juice.
recipeInstructions.text: In a drinking glass with ice, pour ½ of the white claw hard seltzer can, 3¾ ounce of lemon-lime soda, 1 teaspoon of grenadine, and ½ teaspoon of lime juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the remaining ingredients above into another drinking glass with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the remaining ingredients above into another drinking glass with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle the raspberries in a small bowl and add half to each glass.

recipeInstructions.name: On a separate plate, pour the cocktail sugars, dip each side of the lime wedges, and place it in the glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a couple more raspberries. Serve immediately and enjoy!
